### SMD

$$
\text{SMD}_i = \frac{\bar{\text{X}}_{2i} - \bar{\text{X}}_{1i}}{\sqrt{\frac{(n_{1i}-1)\text{SD}^2_{1i}+(n_{2}-1)\text{SD}^2_{2i}}{n_{1i}+n_{2i}-2}}}
$$

$$
\text{Var}({\text{SMD}_i})= \frac{n_{1i}+n_{2}}{n_{1i}n_{2i}}+\frac{\mathrm{SMD}_i^2}{2(n_{1i}+n_{2i})}
$$
